trans-unit.source: Table Service REST API
trans-unit.target: Table Service REST API

trans-unit.source: The Table service offers structured storage in the form of tables.
trans-unit.target: The Table service offers structured storage in the form of tables.

trans-unit.source: The Table service API is a REST API for working with tables and the data that they contain.
trans-unit.target: The Table service API is a REST API for working with tables and the data that they contain.

trans-unit.source: REST API Operations
trans-unit.target: REST API Operations

trans-unit.source: The REST API for the Table service includes the operations listed in the following table.
trans-unit.target: The REST API for the Table service includes the operations listed in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Operation
trans-unit.target: Operation

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Sets the properties of the Table service.
trans-unit.target: Sets the properties of the Table service.

trans-unit.source: Gets the properties of the Table service.
trans-unit.target: Gets the properties of the Table service.

trans-unit.source: Queries the Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) rules for the Table service prior to sending the actual request.
trans-unit.target: Queries the Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) rules for the Table service prior to sending the actual request.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves statistics related to replication for the Table service.
trans-unit.target: Retrieves statistics related to replication for the Table service.

trans-unit.source: This operation is only available on the secondary location endpoint when read-access geo-redundant replication is enabled for the storage account.
trans-unit.target: This operation is only available on the secondary location endpoint when read-access geo-redundant replication is enabled for the storage account.

trans-unit.source: Enumerates the tables in a storage account.
trans-unit.target: Enumerates the tables in a storage account.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new table within a storage account.
trans-unit.target: Creates a new table within a storage account.

trans-unit.source: Deletes a table from a storage account.
trans-unit.target: Deletes a table from a storage account.

trans-unit.source: Returns details about any stored access policies specified on the table that may be used with Shared Access Signatures.
trans-unit.target: Returns details about any stored access policies specified on the table that may be used with Shared Access Signatures.

trans-unit.source: Sets details about any stored access policies specified on the table that may be used with Shared Access Signatures.
trans-unit.target: Sets details about any stored access policies specified on the table that may be used with Shared Access Signatures.

trans-unit.source: Queries data in a table.
trans-unit.target: Queries data in a table.

trans-unit.source: Inserts a new entity into a table.
trans-unit.target: Inserts a new entity into a table.

trans-unit.source: Inserts or merges an entity in a table.
trans-unit.target: Inserts or merges an entity in a table.

trans-unit.source: Inserts or replaces an entity in a table.
trans-unit.target: Inserts or replaces an entity in a table.

trans-unit.source: Updates an existing entity within a table by replacing it.
trans-unit.target: Updates an existing entity within a table by replacing it.

trans-unit.source: Updates an existing entity within a table by merging new property values into the entity.
trans-unit.target: Updates an existing entity within a table by merging new property values into the entity.

trans-unit.source: Deletes an entity within a table
trans-unit.target: Deletes an entity within a table

trans-unit.source: Entity Group Transactions
trans-unit.target: Entity Group Transactions

trans-unit.source: The Table service supports batch operations for <link xlink:href="9ca046aa-e9b4-4eaf-a7c0-d6ccdbaf48b9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Insert Entity</link>, <link xlink:href="96a833e2-388c-460c-bfad-11e723c67d3f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Update Entity</link>, <link xlink:href="55fdf460-c80e-43af-bf1d-fbf5a4ad2291" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Merge Entity</link>, and <link xlink:href="e477539a-d36a-49cc-b3be-916a372d9c92" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Delete Entity</link> operations.
trans-unit.target: The Table service supports batch operations for <link xlink:href="9ca046aa-e9b4-4eaf-a7c0-d6ccdbaf48b9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Insert Entity</link>, <link xlink:href="96a833e2-388c-460c-bfad-11e723c67d3f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Update Entity</link>, <link xlink:href="55fdf460-c80e-43af-bf1d-fbf5a4ad2291" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Merge Entity</link>, and <link xlink:href="e477539a-d36a-49cc-b3be-916a372d9c92" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Delete Entity</link> operations.

trans-unit.source: For more information about batch operations, see <link xlink:href="b10963c6-ced3-4fcc-abee-58a9e1c2b83a" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Performing Entity Group Transactions</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about batch operations, see <link xlink:href="b10963c6-ced3-4fcc-abee-58a9e1c2b83a" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Performing Entity Group Transactions</link>.
